verbs.description: Since Inauguration Day ( January 20 ) , Media Research Center analysts [V: have] reviewed every mention of President Trump and top administration officials on ABC ’s World News Tonight , the CBS Evening News and NBC Nightly News , including weekends . As of August 31 , coverage of the administration has totaled nearly 74 hours ( 4,418 minutes ) of airtime , or about 39 percent of all evening news coverage . Analyzing the networks’ spin makes it clear that the goal of all of this heavy coverage is not to promote the President , but to punish him .

Analyzing the networks’ spin makes it clear that the goal of all of this heavy coverage is not to promote the President , but to punish him .
